com.eghl.sdk

Class EGHL

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eghl.sdk.EGHL

  • public final class EGHL
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that helps communicate with the eGHL payment gateway. This is a singleton class and you can initialize this by using the getInstance() method.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String RAW_RESPONSE
      Key constant that can be used in getting the raw response message in a Bundle object returned from query and payment.
      static int REQUEST_PAIRING
      Activity request code for launching the lightbox activity for pairing.
      static int REQUEST_PAYMENT
      Activity request code for launching the normal payment procedure.
      static int TRANSACTION_AUTHORIZED
      Transaction authorized (for transaction type AUTH)
      static int TRANSACTION_CANCELLED
      Transaction cancelled by the user
      static int TRANSACTION_CAPTURED
      Transaction captured
      static int TRANSACTION_ERROR_IN_WEBVIEW
      There's an error in the WebView loading the payment gateway.
      static int TRANSACTION_FAILED
      Transaction failed
      static int TRANSACTION_INTERNAL_ERROR
      Internal system error
      static int TRANSACTION_MASTERPASS_FINISHED
      Indicates that the masterpass lightbox process is finished.
      static int TRANSACTION_NO_STATUS
      Can't determine the status, try to query again.
      static int TRANSACTION_NOT_EXISTING
      Transaction not exists/not found
      static int TRANSACTION_PENDING
      Sale pending, retry Query
      static int TRANSACTION_REFUNDED
      Transaction refunded
      static int TRANSACTION_REVERSAL_PENDING
      Reversal pending, merchant system can retry Reversal if merchant system initiated the Reversal request or else merchant system can retry Query.
      static int TRANSACTION_REVERSED
      Transaction reversed
      static int TRANSACTION_SUCCESS
      Transaction successful (for transaction type SALE)
      static java.lang.String TXN_MESSAGE
      Key constant that can be used in getting the transaction message in a Bundle object returned from query and payment.
      static java.lang.String TXN_STATUS
      Key constant that can be used in getting the transaction status in a Bundle object returned from query and payment.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static EGHL getInstance()
        Singleton initializer for the EGHL class
        Returns:
        singleton instance of the EGHL class.

      • getPassword

        protected java.lang.String getPassword(android.content.Context context)
        Reads the AndroidManifest and gets the value of the meta-data named: com.epay.eghl.sdk.PASSWORD.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        Returns:
        the String value of the meta-data for password

      • getPaymentGateway

        protected java.lang.String getPaymentGateway(android.content.Context context)
        Reads the AndroidManifest and gets the value of the meta-data named: com.epay.eghl.sdk.PAYMENT_GATEWAY.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        Returns:
        the String value of the meta-data for PAYMENT_GATEWAY.

      • executeQuery

        public void executeQuery(android.content.Context context,
                         android.os.Bundle params,
                         QueryCallback callback)
        Executes a query transaction to the payment gateway.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        params - Parameters for the Query. Please use the QueryParams.Builder to help you build the parameters needed.
        callback - An object that implements QueryCallback. Its implemented methods will be called accordingly to the result of the query.

      • executeMasterpassRequest

        public void executeMasterpassRequest(android.content.Context context,
                                     android.os.Bundle firstRequest,
                                     MasterpassCallback callback)
        Executes the first Masterpass request to the payment gateway
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        firstRequest - Parameters for the first request of Masterpass. Please use the MasterpassParams.Builder to help you build the parameters needed.
        callback - An object that implements MasterpassCallback. Its implemented methods will be called accordingly to the result of the Masterpass first request.

      • executeCapture

        public void executeCapture(android.content.Context context,
                           android.os.Bundle params,
                           CaptureCallback callback)
        Executes a Capture transaction to the payment gateway.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        params - Parameters for the Capture. Please use the CaptureParams.Builder to help you build the parameters needed.
        callback - An object that implements CaptureCallback. Its implemented methods will be called accordingly to the result of the capture.

      • generateId

        public java.lang.String generateId(java.lang.String strPrefix)
        Generates a random ID that you can use in Payment ID and Order ID parameters.
        Parameters:
        strPrefix - Prefix that will be prepended to the ID.
        Returns:
        The generated ID.

      • executePayment

        public void executePayment(android.os.Bundle params,
                           android.app.Activity activity)
        Executes a payment to the payment gateway and return the results to the caller activity.
        Parameters:
        params - Parameters for the payment. Please use the PaymentParams.Builder to help you build the parameters needed.
        activity - The caller activity that would handle the result of the payment. Please make sure that this Activity overrides the Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) method. The request code for this will be REQUEST_PAYMENT.

      • executePairing

        public void executePairing(android.os.Bundle params,
                           android.app.Activity activity)
        Launches the Masterpass Lightbox
        Parameters:
        params - Parameters for the LightBox. Please use the LightboxParams.Builder to help you build the parameters needed.
        activity - The caller activity that would handle the result of the LightBox. Please make sure that this Activity overrides the Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) method. The request code for this will be REQUEST_PAIRING.
